items.label: 5783f0df5457a3e07b29b89f
items.name: Residential, Standard Offer Service (Schedule R)
items.description:
Generation and Transmission Service Charges-Customers who do not receive service from
an alternative Electric Supplier as defined in the Company's General Terms and Conditions will
receive Generation and Transmission Services from the Company under the provisions of Rider
"SOS"-Standard Offer Service
items.basicinformationcomments: Other Adjustments not included (due to monthly basis of revision) are Delivery Tax + MD Environmental Surcharge + Montgomery County Surcharge or Prince Georges County Surcharge + Administrative Credit + BSA + RGGI Rate Credit
items.energycomments:
Energy Charge= Distribution + Generation + Transmission
Adjustments = Transmission + Distribution + EmPower MD CHarge + Demand Resource Surcharge + PCA + MD Environmental Surcharge +Bill Stabilization + Delivery Tax + Delivery Tax.... Multiply by Gross Receipts Tax
